ygData.subject: Re: Crude Stein
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You don t have to kill bouncers to get a Crude Stein. You can also earn one by doing the Noble Hunters and Nork s Severed Arm quests (both start in Ogguk).
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Doug Sorensen <belgarth_of_surefall@...>
>
> The Crude stein if from killing the Bouncers in the
>Ferrott zone. Don't think you can get them any other
>way. They are in the high 30s to 40th level range and
>hit extremely hard. Over 100 points per swing, attack
>fast and have a brutal kick too.
>
>Look for Bouncer Hurd and Bouncer Flerb, there may be
>others, I am familiar with those two.
>
>Belgarth
>

You don't have to kill bouncers to get a Crude Stein. You can also earn one
by doing the Noble Hunters and Nork's Severed Arm quests (both start in
Ogguk). Please note that both of these quests give random items for
completing them. The crude stein is just one of the random items given.
